greeting: Hello $0. This is the ship's computer speaking. Something is very wrong with the ship's engine, and you're the only crew member I could wake up. Your GUI is down, so you're going to need to use the spoken interface.
taskOne: I've brought up the engine diagnostics page for you. You're going to need to check through the different reports, and then use the form at the bottom of the page to select the issues we need to address. Press command F5 to start. If you need to hear this again, press shift S.
